```{r}
library("nanoparquet")
library("SummarizedExperiment")
library("tidyverse")
source("df_to_se.R")
```

```{r}
# https://github.com/Walt-Lab/OLINK/tree/main/data
df <- read_parquet(file = "240214_Walt_Olink_HT_Raw.parquet")
```

```{r}
se <- df_to_se(
  observation_id = "SampleID",
  feature_id = "OlinkID",
  value = c("NPX", "ExtNPX"),
  observation_anno = NULL,
  feature_anno = NULL,
  detect_colData_cols = F,
  detect_rowData_cols = F,
  ambiguous = "none"
)
colnames(colData(se))
colnames(rowData(se))
```
